input.sentences: there are lots of place to go to in the city .
parks are a nice place for clubs to get together .
groups like to focus on different things that bring them together .
even explore art or various cultures .
maybe there 's a group for you to join and enjoy .
output.sentences: I'm in new city for my vacation.
This place has a lot of beautiful parks with people hanging out.
I'm so glad I didn't forget to bring my picnic basket and cloth.
Near the park was an art museum that I visited.
As I walked to the train to leave I knew I wanted you to join me next time.
